name: PartialHipAndPartialKneeReplacements
title: Partial hip and partial knee replacements
description:
This set of values identifies patients who have a partial hip or partial knee replacement.
NOTE:  VALUE SET UNDER DEVELOPMENT AS MEASURE TESTING IS ONGOING.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have a partial hip or partial knee replacement.),(Data Element Scope: Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Replacement of acetabulum, femoral shaft, acetabular surface, femoral surface, tibial surface, lower femur, upper femur, patella.),(Exclusion Criteria: Revisions, resurfacing, total hip and total knee replacements are excluded.)
